attributes.action: Change the date of the Man U v Hull City fixture on the 24 May 2009 to an earlier kick off or another day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One of our friends Alex Turgoose is due to get married on the 24 May 2009. However this is when Hull City play Manchester United at home. We have never played top flight football in our 104 year history. So please PM - support our change the date campaign. We all want to go to the wedding, but we all want to go to the football aswell !! Help us and support our campaign to make his life (and ours) easier !

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
